page.title: 01North Swindon.
page.content: Swindon is reputed to be the fastest growing town in Europe with new estates and roads which give easy access to motorways.The main shopping area in North Swindon is Gorse Hill which has 109 shops.North Swindon has 11 schools the two main schools being Headlands and Hreod Parkway secondary schools.North Swindon is mainly residential but has 5 industrial estates which are a fair way from the houses.The main residential estates in North Swindon are Pinehurst and Penhill.The new housing areas at Moredon and Haydon Wick are rapidly using up the remaining farmland.The major road in North Swindon is Cricklade Road,the busiest part of the road is Stratton Crossroads which has over 1,000 vehicles using the junction every hour.
